TextLibrary.Text: Jotun told me the Helm belonged to him. I returned it, just the same as I returned your Hammer.
Jotun told me the Helm belonged to him. I returned it, just the same as I returned your Hammer.
Jotun told me the Helm belonged to him. I returned it, just the same as I returned your Hammer.
Jotun told me the Helm belonged to him. I returned it, just the same as I returned your Hammer.
But the Helm is worth twice the Hammer. Go to Jotun and get my Cloak back as payment.
